com.mpos.lottery.te.common.util

类 HexCoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mpos.lottery.te.common.util.HexCoder

  • public class HexCoder
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility to transfer byte[] into hex string, or transfer hex string into byte[].
